repeating.value: select object_name,i_chronicle_id from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)'

select event_name, user_name, time_stamp, string_1, string_2, string_3, string_4, string_5, version_label, attribute_list, object_name, attribute_list_id from dm_audittrail where chronicle_id ='$value(i_chronicle_id)' order by time_stamp asc

select r_object_id, attribute_list, i_position from dmi_audittrail_attrs where r_object_id in (select attribute_list_id from dm_audittrail where chronicle_id = '$value(i_chronicle_id)') order by i_position desc enable (row_based)
